subjectarea.name: org.infogrid.lid.model.account
subjectarea.username: LID Account and Session Subject Area
subjectarea.userdescription: Captures the notion of an account at a site, and sessions performed with this account. Local and/or remote personas may be associated with the account.

entitytype.name: Account
entitytype.userdescription: A user at a particular website, aka account.

propertytype.name: Nickname
propertytype.userdescription: The user's local nick name, if any.

enum.name: Created
enum.userdescription: Account has been created, but never been used.

enum.name: Active
enum.userdescription: The Account has been in use and can be used again.

enum.name: Disabled
enum.userdescription: The Account has been disabled and cannot currently be used. It may or may not become active again.

enum.name: Obsoleted
enum.userdescription: The Account has been disabled and will never be used again.

entitytype.name: Session
entitytype.userdescription: A session of a user at a website.

propertytype.name: FirstAuthenticated
propertytype.userdescription: The TimeStamp when the user was first authenticated at this site.

propertytype.name: LastAuthenticated
propertytype.userdescription: The TimeStamp when the user was most recently authenticated at this site.

propertytype.name: LastUsedSuccessfully
propertytype.userdescription: The TimeStamp when the user was most recently using this session successfully.

propertytype.name: ValidUntil
propertytype.userdescription: The TimeStamp when the session has, or will expire and a new authentication is required.

propertytype.name: CreatedAtIp
propertytype.userdescription: The IP address from where this session was created.

relationshiptype.name: Session_For_Account
relationshiptype.userdescription: Identifies the Account that owns this Session

relationshiptype.name: Account_MayUseIdentity_MeshObject
relationshiptype.userdescription: Enumerates the identities possibly used by this Account

relationshiptype.name: Account_AtSite_WebResource
relationshiptype.userdescription: Identifies the website where the Account is hosted

relationshiptype.name: Session_AtSite_WebResource
relationshiptype.userdescription: Identifies the website where the session is taking place

relationshiptype.name: Session_UsesIdentity_MeshObject
relationshiptype.userdescription: Identifies the identity used for this session
